ingredients.item: 2 x 90g packs fresh Waitrose Popped Garden Peas (or 200g frozen peas, thawed)
Juice and grated zest of 1 lemon

instructions.step: Rinse the couscous in a sieve under cold water and cook according to pack instructions. Drain and set aside.
Blanch the asparagus and peas for 3 minutes in boiling water, then refresh under cold water and drain.
Stir the asparagus, peas, courgette, pistachios and herbs into the couscous with the lemon juice and oil. Season with the lemon zest and sea salt and cracked black pepper.
Serve alongside the tagine with harissa and natural yogurt.
